data.text: Nya sia ku ɖe Amonitɔwo ŋuti:
Ke Yehowa be, “Ŋkekewo li gbɔna, esi mado aʋaɣli ɖe,
“O Hesbon, fa avi kple ɣli,
Nu ka ŋuti mietsɔ miaƒe balimewo le adegbe ƒom,
Mahe ŋɔdzi va dziwò tso ame siwo ƒo xlã wò la gbɔ.”
“Gake emegbe la, magaɖo Amonitɔwo ƒe nunyonamewo te.”
Ku ɖe Edom ŋuti:
Mi ame siwo le Dedan, mitrɔ, misi,
Ne waintsetsegbelawo va gbe waintsetsewo na wò la,
Gake nye la, maɖe amama Esau,
Migblẽ miaƒe tsyɔ̃eviwo ɖi,
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi: “Nenye be ame siwo medze be woano kplu la o la noe la, ekema nu ka wɔ woaɖe asi le miawo ya ŋu tomahemahee? Eya ta miayi tomahemahee o, ke boŋ miano kplu la godoo.”
Yehowa be, “Meta ɖokuinye ƒe agbe be, Bozra azu aƒedo, ŋɔdzinu, ŋunyɔnu kple ɖiŋudonu eye eƒe duwo katã azu aƒedo tegbetegbee.”
Mexɔ gbedeasi sia tso Yehowa gbɔ:
“Azɔ mawɔ wò nàzu sue le dukɔwo dome
Ŋɔdzi si le ŋuwò kple dada si le wò dzi me la ble wò,
“Edom azu ŋɔdzinu,
Anɔ abe ale si metsrɔ̃ Sodom kple Gomora
“Maɖe Edom ɖe nu tso eƒe anyigba dzi zi ɖeka,
Eya ta ɖo to nàse nu si Yehowa ɖo ɖe Edom ŋuti,
Woƒe anyidzedze ƒe gbeɖiɖi ana anyigba naʋuʋu;
Kpɔ ɖa! Hɔ̃ aɖe ayi yame ʋĩi,
Tso Damasko ŋuti:
Damasko zu nu beli,
Nu ka ta womegblẽ du xɔŋkɔ
Via ŋutsuwo aku, atsi mɔtatawo dzi le nyateƒe me,
Matɔ dzo Damasko ƒe gliwo
Nya sia ku ɖe Kedar kple Hazor fiaɖuƒe siwo dzi Babilonia fia Nebukadnezar va dze la ŋu:
Woaxɔ woƒe avɔgbadɔwo kple woƒe lãhawo
“Misi dzo kaba!
“Tso nàdze dukɔ si li bɔkɔɔ kple dukɔ si si dzideƒo le la dzi.
“Woƒe kposɔwo azu nuhaha
“Hazor azu nɔƒe na amegaxiwo
Esia nye Yehowa ƒe nya si va na Nyagblɔɖila Yeremia ku ɖe Elam ŋuti, nya sia va nɛ le Yuda fia Zedekia ƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe gɔmedze ƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me:
Ale Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Aƒetɔ la gblɔe nye esi:
Makplɔ ya eneawo tso dziƒo
Magbã Elam le eƒe futɔ siwo le eƒe agbe yome tim la ƒe ŋkume,
Maɖo nye zikpui anyi ɖe Elam
“Ke hã la, magaɖo Elam ƒe nunyonamewo te le
